title: The Fortuneteller and the Three Customers‎‎

infobox.Title:: The Fortuneteller and the Three Customers
infobox.Japanese title:: 占い師と三人の客  (Uranaishi to san'nin no kyaku)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi  Kazunobu Chiba  Female forensics member
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Chiemi Hironaka (sub-character)  Hiroshi Ogawa (Design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Isshin Chiba as Kazunobu Chiba  Akiko Takeguchi as Sadako Baba (Sadako Barbara)  Takashi Kondo as Masaya Ogu  Takashi Akaishi as Police officer  Kenta Kanemaru as Police detective  Masafumi Kimura as Shinsuke Kanawa  Sanae Kobayashi as Fukami Endo  Susumu Chiba as Ryoichi Sazanami
infobox.Closing song:: Kimi to Koi no Mama de Owarenai Itsumo Yume no Mama ja Irarenai

sections.Situation: Because the victim was a well-liked fortuneteller, the police are able to narrow down the list of suspects to three people: Shinsuke Kanawa, Fukami Endo, and Ryoichi Sazanami, all of which have grudge against the victim for supposedly gave the fortune that had instead brought them misfortune. Additionally, all three of them each has their own possession involved in the crime: Endo's broach was found in the same room that Baba was discovered, Kanawa's lighter was found in the park she was strangled, and Sazanami's car was used to transport the victim's body from the park to her house.

sections.Trivia:
- The painting in Baba mansion is about Hirasaka mansion from The Séance's Double Locked Room Mystery Case.
- Ryoichi Sazanami's vehicle is a eucalyptus green pearl 2006 Honda Civic [FD].
